detaileddescription.para: Registry is the central class for entity management in the ECS. It handles entity creation/destruction and stores component arrays.

Key Responsibilities:
Entity ID management
Component array storage/access
System registration and execution
Entity creation/destruction

Usage:
Create a Registry instance
Register component arrays with register_component()
Register systems with add_system()
Spawn entities and add components with add_component()
Run systems each frame via run_systems()
Clean up dead entities with delete_queued_entities()

listitem.para: spawn_entity() Creates a new active entity and returns the id.
spawnInactivedEntity() Creates a new inactive entity and returns the id.
entity_from_index() Gets entity id from index.
add_component() Adds a component to an entity.
emplace_component() Constructs and adds a component to an entity.
remove_component() Removes a component from an entity.
register_component() Registers a new component array.
queue_for_deletion() Queues an entity for deletion.
queue_for_creation() Queues an entity for creation.
